H0.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. Message

H1.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. Data

H2.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. Knowledge

H3.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. information

A4.text: communication refers to the message that is being communicated

A5.text: Communication is commonly defined as the transmission of information

A6.text: Beynon-Davies uses the concept of a sign to differentiate between data and information; data is a series of symbols, while information occurs when the symbols are used to refer to something.

A7.text: knowledge sharing, which involves the transmission of information from one person to another

A8.text: the reproduction of knowledge and its changes often happen through some form of communication used to transfer knowledge
